long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Converts all Twitter.com urls to Mac twitter app specific URLs.

It currently only works with TweetBot as there's no way to do it in EchoFon and I'm not sure I can bring myself to install the official Twitter App.
